name: Hardest 11.5 "Do Not Forsake Me, O My Postman" Trivia Quiz | Television | 10 Questions

questions.text: Who from the "Diane Years" had a cameo in the beginning of this episode?
questions.explanation:
Derek McGrath.

	Derek McGrath played his old character Andy Schroeder.  He came in demanding to see Diane. When Woody told him that Diane hadn't worked there in five or six years, Andy said, "Ok" and left. He had dynamite strapped to his body.

questions.text: When Woody was telling the story of Uncle Arlo, he said he came back "with his head between his legs." Sam corrected him and told him the expression was "tail between his legs". How did Woody respond?
questions.correct: There was a train accident on the way back.
options: There was an incident with a guillotine.
There was a different expression in Hanover than in Boston.
There were things too scary for Sam to hear.
questions.explanation:
There was a train accident on the way back.

	Woody told a lot of stories about Hanover and his family. In almost all the stories someone had been hurt or worse.

John Mahoney.

	John Mahoney may ring a bell with people as he was Martin Crane on "Frasier". In this episode, Sy charged $200 to write a jingle for Cheers.

questions.text: Who surprised Cliff by showing up pregnant?
questions.explanation:
Maggie.

	Cliff fainted when he saw her. He was also confused as to how he could have fathered a child.

questions.text: Who was upset about the news that someone from Cliff's past was pregnant?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	She said she begged him to get fixed. She then said "I offered to pay for it, I even offered to do it."

questions.text: Why didn't Cliff think the baby was his?
questions.correct: He never had sex with Maggie.
options: He hadn't seen Maggie in over a year.
He never had sex with Maggie.
He couldn't get a woman pregnant.
questions.explanation:
He never had sex with Maggie.

	Cliff felt like a failure because he never had sex with Maggie. Sam told him he was a stud.

questions.text: Who figured out first that Cliff was not the father?
questions.explanation:
Carla.

	Carla found this all very amusing. Cliff didn't tell them because he was afraid of what they'd think of him.

questions.text: What did Sy spell wrong in his Cheers jingle?
questions.explanation:
Cheers.

	He spelled it "C-H-E-R-S". Once again he set it to the tune of "Old MacDonald".

questions.text: Who did get the woman pregnant?
questions.explanation:
Jerry.

	Maggie said Jerry decided to leave her when they were going to get married. So, Cliff offered to marry her and make an honest woman of her.

No.

	He did, however, find out that he had sex with Maggie. He, however, had no recollection of it.
